description: Ho Goo Hee, a high schooler and self-proclaimed pushover, discovers a new application on her phone that offers to take revenge on anyone whose name she writes in it.
keywords: tv mini series,web drama,coming of age,youth,school
name: Boksoonoteu

review.name: Revenge can be sweet
review.reviewBody:
Short, sweet, and cute! BUT ending was too abrupt and left many questions unanswered

The main cast was all pretty good at acting, and Cha Eun Woo's visuals were top notch as usual - the cameo by Astro was really great as well!

The issue I had with this drama, however, was that the ending came too abruptly and a lot of issues could have been further resolved before they ended the series. It was, to say the least, unsatisfying, and I didn't even realize it had ended until I kept searching for the next episode but couldn't find one.

Overall, though, this was a really cute drama and I would recommend it for anyone looking for a short, fun series!
